name: Chatty Cathy
tip: Highest number of chat messages sent.

name: Death Frenzy
tip: Highest streak of deaths without a kill.

name: Kill Frenzy
tip: Highest streak of kills without a death.

name: Lamer
tip: Number of melee plus artillery kills.

name: Artillery
tip: Most damage done by artillery weapons.

name: Crotch Shot
tip: Most kills by hits to the lower torso.

name: FUBAR
tip: Most damage done by FUBAR weapons.

name: Heavy Machine Gun
tip: Most kills by heavy machine gun.

name: Jeep
tip: Most kills by mounted jeep gun.

name: Light Machine Gun
tip: Most kills by light machine gun.

name: Limb Shot
tip: Most kills by hits to the arm, leg, hand or foot.

name: Marksmanship
tip: Most kills by hits to the head or neck.

name: CTF - Agent
tip: Most flags stolen from an enemy base.

name: CTF - Conqueror
tip: Most enemy flags returned to home flag.

name: CTF - Hero
tip: Most dropped friendly flags picked up.

name: CTF - Ranger
tip: Most dropped enemy flags picked up.

name: CTF - Winner
tip: Most times on winning team for CTF.

name: CTF - Loser
tip: Most times on losing team for CTF.

name: DOM - Defender
tip: Most kills near a friendly flag point.

name: DOM - Patriot
tip: Most deaths near a flag point.

name: DOM - Wingman
tip: Most kills near an enemy flag point.

name: DOM - Winner
tip: Most times on winning team for DOM.

name: DOM - Loser
tip: Most times on losing team for DOM.

name: FTF - Defender
tip: Most kills near a friendly cow carrier.

name: FTF - Wingman
tip: Most kills near a cow carrier.

name: FTF - Winner
tip: Most times on winning team for FTF.

name: FTF - Loser
tip: Most times on losing team for FTF.

name: SFTF - Defender
tip: Most kills near a friendly cow carrier.

name: SFTF - Wingman
tip: Most kills near a cow carrier.

name: SFTF - Winner
tip: Most times on winning team for SFTF.

name: SFTF - Loser
tip: Most times on losing team for SFTF.

name: TDM - Winner
tip: Most times on winning team for TDM.

name: TDM - Loser
tip: Most times on losing team for TDM.
